siteMetadata.title: Artem Demo, frontend dev.
siteMetadata.description: Blog about FrontEnd: JS, CSS, HTML

node.excerpt: Let’s talk for a moment about logging in the FrontEnd application. Yes, we can use standard  or any other  that is available to us, but what we really want to have is some way to have a log available, when it’s allowed and to hide the logging, when we’re not interested in it. So let’s review this.

frontmatter.title: Custom logger for the FrontEnd application
